#summary How to deploy lb-bind
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

How to download, configure, compile, install and run lb-bind


= Details =

==Requires==

  * libssl-dev
  * sysstat
  * ruby-daemons

==Download==
{{{
svn checkout http://lb-bind.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/bind-9.9.0 lb-bind
}}}

==Configure==
{{{
configure --without-openssl --enable-fixed-rrset --disable-ipv6 --sysconfdir=/etc/bind --enable-threads
}}}

==Compile==
{{{
make
}}}

==Install==
{{{
sudo make install
}}}

==Setup==

In `trunk/Bind_dependencies.rar` you will find `etc_bind` (copy it to `/etc/bind`)
{{{
sed -i 's/192\.168\.10\.10/your\.IP\.Addr\.ess/g' * in/*
}}}
Finally inside /etc/bind run 
{{{
./set_ttl.sh <TTL>
}}}


===Alternatively===
Follow [http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=236093 this guide]

omitting this
{{{
forwarders {
     # Replace the address below with the address of your provider's DNS server
     123.123.123.123;
};
}}}

==Run==
Execute
{{{
named -4 -c /etc/bind/named.conf -n <number of cpus>
}}}
